          <title>
            <string language="en">Heating</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Heizung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Chauffage</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Heating</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Heating</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θέρμανση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Calefacción</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows a beaker with potassium (IV) manganate crystal dissolved in water being heated.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">beaker</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">dissolving</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Heating</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">water</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt einen Becher mit 
Manganatkristall dem Kalium (iv), der im Wasser aufgelöst wird, das 
erhitzt wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre un becher avec le 
cristal de manganate du potassium (iv) dissous dans l'eau étant 
chauffée.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra uma taça com o cristal 
do manganate do potassium (iv) dissolvido na água que está sendo 
aquecida.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra una coppa con il 
cristallo del manganato del potassio (iv) dissolto in acqua che è 
riscaldata.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει μια κούπα με manganate 
καλίου (IV) το κρύσταλλο που διαλύεται στο ύδωρ που 
θερμαίνεται.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra un cubilete con el 
cristal del manganato del potasio (iv) disuelto en el agua que es 
calentada.</string>
          </description>
